name: BodogBrand
overview:
At BodogBrand.com, we canâ€™t understand why people are frightened by new ideas â€“ itâ€™s the old ones the frighten us.

Created in 2005 and based in the Caribbean nation of Antigua, BodogBrand.com is a brand licensing and branded venture capital organization whose mandate is to extend and strengthen the BodogBrand.com by entering into licensing and funding relationships with entrepreneurs who wish to launch or grow their complementary businesses by leveraging the strength and depth of this world-class entertainment brand.

Itâ€™s a new way of thinking â€“ one that lets entrepreneurs control their own destinies and their teams retain the innovation and passion that makes their businesses hum, but allows them to harness the momentum of a global brand to take their success to the next level. Every licensee that succeeds lifts the others, as the brand strength and recognition snowballs.

BodogBrand.com holds the exclusive, worldwide rights to license the BodogBrand.com in all sectors and enters into select brand licensing and/or funding relationships in order to create an ecosystem of brand licensees whose efforts reinforce and multiply one anotherâ€™s successes.

funding_round.source_description: BodogBrand Bought Slots.com For About $5.8 Million, Intends To License It
